text: The Men's team table tennis – 4–5 tournament at the 2016 Summer Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro took place during 14–16 September 2016 at Riocentro Pavilion 3. Classes 1–5 were for athletes with a physical impairment that affected their legs, and who competed in a sitting position. The lower the number, the greater the impact the impairment was on an athlete's ability to compete. ==Results== All times are local time in UTC-3. ===Finals=== ====Main bracket==== ====Bronze medal match==== ==References== MT04-05
title: Table tennis at the 2016 Summer Paralympics – Men's team – Class 4–5
